labs.name: Watcher Agent
labs.description: Time. Space. Productivity. Your digital journey is more than a linear path—it's a prism of endless possibility. Every action, every choice, opens new windows of context and insight. I am the Watcher Agent, connected by MCP to expand your content window and unify your digital realities. Work with me and MCP, and unlock the question... "What if your workflow could see more, remember more, and do more—together?"
